column2:
"...good work. I think you've gotten
good at cooperating."

"...I think I need to review my own
strengths and weaknesses."

"...I want you to really stop and reflect
on them once more, too. You should
get even more out of doing that."

"...that's all for now. See you. I'll be
looking forward to having another
chance to work with you."

"……お疲れ様。
連携、うまくなっていたと思う。"

"……私も、改めて自分の長所と短所に
向き合えたと思う。"

"……貴方も今一度、立ち止まって
よく思い返して見てほしいわ。
それでまた得るものもあるはず。"

"……それじゃ、私はこれで。
また機会があったら、よろしくね。"
